definitions.definition: A state of being pleased or contented; gratification.
definitions.example: He remembered with pleasure his home and family.

definitions.definition: A person, thing or action that causes enjoyment.
definitions.example: Having a good night's sleep is one of life's little pleasures.
What is your pleasure: coffee or tea?

definitions.definition: The will or desire of someone or some agency in power.
definitions.example: at Congress's pleasure: whenever or as long as Congress desires

definitions.definition: To give or afford pleasure to.

definitions.example: Johnny pleasured Jackie orally last night.

definitions.definition: To take pleasure; to seek or pursue pleasure.
